sentences.en: A weak quake shook Chiba, near the capital, about five minutes earlier.
sentences.cn: 约5分钟之前,在距东京不远的千叶市也有过一次微震.

sentences.en: Athens'Geodynamic Institute registered the quake at 6.5 in magnitude.
sentences.cn: 而雅典地球动力研究所的记录是6.5级.

sentences.en: China said it would gratefully accept international help to with the quake.
sentences.cn: 中国表示表示感激,愿意接受国际援助以应对震灾.

sentences.en: In less than a minute, the earth started to quake.
sentences.cn: 还不到一分钟后, 地就开始摇晃了.

sentences.en: It went through with a horrid thundering that made my belly quake.
sentences.cn: 河水滚滚直泻,激起轰隆隆的可怕的巨响,使我不禁浑身发抖.

sentences.en: Office workers in downtown Chengdu took the streets again after the quake.
sentences.cn: 成都市区的写字楼办公人员再次冲向街头.

sentences.en: Security was on the minds of id during the development of Quake 3.
sentences.cn: 安全是id在开发Quake3时就考虑的到的因素.

sentences.en: Social phobics quake at the thought of meeting strangers.
sentences.cn: 患有社交恐惧症的人一想到要见陌生人就发抖。

sentences.en: The earth suddenly began to quake.
The explosion made the whole house quake.
sentences.cn: 爆炸使整个房子都晃动起来。

sentences.en: The lamp is Small volume, light weight, water - proof, quake - proof, antisepticize, explosion - proof.
sentences.cn: 灯具体积小, 重量轻, 防水, 防震, 防腐, 防暴.

sentences.en: The pillars of the heavens quake, aghast at his rebuke.
sentences.cn: 天的柱子, 因他的斥责,震动惊奇.

sentences.en: The quake afflictedall provided with clothing, food and other things they needed.
sentences.cn: 群众提供了衣服 、 食品和其他需要的东西.

sentences.en: The quake destroyed mud buildings in many remote villages.
sentences.cn: 地震摧毁了许多偏远村庄的泥土房屋。

sentences.en: This voice made the boys gasp and quake.
sentences.cn: 这声音使孩子们喘气和发抖.

sentences.en: This voice made the boys gasp and quake. It was Injun Joe's!
sentences.cn: 这个声音吓得两个孩子喘不过气来,直发抖, 是印第安-乔的声音!

sentences.en: Wear a green ribbon and show your respect to the quake victims!
sentences.cn: 别上绿色的丝带,为灾区同胞祈福!

trans.tran_en: if the earth, a building etc quakes, it shakes violently
to shake or tremble, usually because you are very frightened
